attributes.additional_details: We are at a turning point with technology that is now having a detrimental impact on people’s physical health and wellbeing with increased WiFi in the homes, we now need reviews of its safety on the body with gov guidelines. Patents of weaponry to not be public domain. Support for TIs of gangstalking. Regulations to protect people from extensive existing threats which are being ignored. Stop all neurotech that manipulates nervous system and mind from being commercialised. Follow Chile’s example.
attributes.background: Introduce human rights around technology so we can use it safely moving forwards. Rapid advancement and introduction of tech with no trial is causing harm. We want public consultations so wider public views can be heard and reviewed. Stop forcing it on us when we have no human rights in place.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "human rights around technology".
